name: workflow_update_customer_group.v3
description: Open a customer by numeric admin ID and update their Customer Group to the provided value, then save.

steps.description: Navigate directly to the Customer Edit page for the given customer ID.
Open the Account Information tab to expose editable fields including Group.
Set the Group dropdown to the desired customer group.
Save Customer to persist the group change.

input_schema.name: customer_id
input_schema.description: Customer entity ID used in the admin edit URL (numeric string). Example: 33

input_schema.name: group_label
input_schema.description: Visible text of the option in Account Information > Group select.
